<!-- Set Up-->
```{css, echo = FALSE}
figure {
    margin: 0;
}
```

```{r, setup, include = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  error = TRUE, 
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE)

audio_player <- function(file, dir = 'audio/'){
  writeLines(sprintf('<figure>
    <figcaption>%s</figcaption>
  <audio controls src="%s">
    Your browser does not support the <code>audio</code> element.
  </audio>
</figure>', file, paste0(dir, file)))
}

all_audio_files <- function(dir = 'audio'){
  for(x in list.files(dir)){
    audio_player(x)
  }
}
```
<!-- end set up -->


# Audio Files

```{r, results = 'asis'}
all_audio_files()
```
